name: Simit Modi
bio: Computer Engineering undergrad at SAL Institute of Technology (GTU), graduating in 2027.
Developed Stride end-to-end — from concept to code, shaping every detail of the platform.
Formula 1 and aviation enthusiast, thriving on precision, speed, and innovation both on and off the track.

bio: Currently Studying in 3rd year B.E(Computer Engineering).

Focused on practical learning and professional growth, with interests in problem-solving, and innovative software solutions.

bio: Currently studying in 3rd Year B.E. (Computer Engineering, 5th Semester).

Passionate about solving complex problems and building innovative, user-centric web solutions.

Love mixing tech with creativity to make things stand out and easy for the greater good.

bio: A dedicated Computer Engineering student with a keen interest in web technologies.
